title: Sexy Carrot

metadata.label: Donor
metadata.value: Magdalene J.H. Lam and Stephen E. Davis

description:
Paint on Wood

Ms. Magdalene Lam and Mr. Stephen Davis acquired this piece while on holiday in the Gothic Quarter of the historic city of Barcelona. As an asexual couple (initially diagnosed by Harish S. Bhaskar) it reminds them of how animals behave in the wild. 

After its acquisition, two more works (a coffee cup and espresso cup) were added to this collection. They are currently archived for preservation and not on display.
